text: Tara ki jamine bhramana kare na? Tahale tara dekhata ye, tadera purbabartidera parinama kirupa hayechila, saktite tara chila edera ceye prabala, tara jami casa karata, tara seta abada karata edera abada karara ceye besi. Ara tadera kache esechila tadera rasulagana spasta pramanadisaha; bastuta allah emana nana ye, tadera prati yuluma karena, kintu tara nijera'i nijedera upara yuluma karechila
